name: Eye Shoot Bullet
description:
THIS GAME IS CURRENTLY IN DEVELOPMENT IMPORTANT THIS GAME IS ONLY PROGRAMMED TO BE PLAYED WITH A CONTROLLER.  IF YOU PLAY WITH OTHER METHODS WE WONT' BE RESPONSIBLE OF GAMEPLAY FAILURES. THERE'S AN ISSUE WITH THE BLUETOOTH SERVICE OF THE PS4 CONTROLLERS WITH UNITY THAT MAKES THE INPUT TO BE ALTERED, THIS CAN BE SOLVED PLUGGING THE CONTROLLER OR EMULATING AN XBOX CONTROLLER.

If you expierence any bug or want to share your expierence and your highscores you can go to the community window.
  INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS  

Download the .rar and unzip it using

Right Click+ Extract files

It will create a folder with all the game data.

To play the game you must click in the file with the following icon.

   INTRODUCTION   

Eye Shoot Bullet is a Shoot'em up game where you play against hordes of infernal enemies. You'll have to be  fast if you're willing to last more than a  minute. This monsters won't give you no time to relax. But not all the odds are against you. With each enemy killed you gain experience to level up and unlock powerful abilities in each run.

   CREDITS   

Luis Ignacio Viladevall de Lecea: Programming, Art, Game design
